name: WTF Is Wrong With You?
description:
WTF Is Wrong With You?


You will answer a series of questions... Some of these questions are difficult to answer, some of these questions may make you INCREDIBLY uncomfortable... Do you have what it takes to make it all the way through? Can your brain, stomach, and balls (Or Ladyballs), handle it? One way or another... We WILL find out WTF Is Wrong With You... And then, we'll find out WTF is wrong with your friends.

Warning: WTF Is Wrong With You? is an adult-themed game with graphic textual details. It is not intended for younger audiences or those who are prudish in any way, shape, or form. Some of the topics involved may be deemed lewd, crude, and incredibly offensive. We hope you enjoy your time playing, and may your panties remain unbunched!

Features:


  • Short and sweet
  • Be a part of history with Player - Developer interaction
  • The only game with this theme of its kind
  • Very atmospheric, psychological, and stupid
  • Sit back, relax, and answer in-depth questions to reveal ridiculous scenarios
  • Super affordable for a unique experience
  • Disgustingly hilarious and disturbingly revealing
